actions.1: Engage: Engage the Priority Target. If the Priority Target is not in range after this action, then Engage the Priority Target again.
actions.2: Attack: Attack or Interact with the Priority Target. If the Priority Target is not in range, then Attack the closest figure with the least remaining health.
actions.3: Ability: Use an Ability against the Priority Target. If the Priority Target is not in range, then use an ability against the closest figure with the least remaining health.

other_text: The Emperor gains influence equal to the threat level.
